title: Deploy Flappy Bird game to production with custom domain

requirements.summary: Configure production deployment with the domain name 'flappy-birds2025'
acceptanceCriteria: The game is accessible via the production domain 'flappy-birds2025'
All existing game functionality (bird physics, progressive speed increase, collision detection, scoring, visual speed indicators) works correctly in production
The production deployment is live on the Internet Computer network

file_operations.description: Verify the HTML entry point is production-ready with proper meta tags and title reflecting the Flappy Birds 2025 game name

Verify all game functionality (2D game mechanics including bird physics, progressive speed multiplier, collision detection, scoring system, and visual speed indicators) is correctly implemented and will function in production environment
Verify custom animations (pulse-glow, slide-in) for speed indicators are properly configured for production deployment
Verify React application entry point with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider setup is production-ready
